<MethodEndpoint

</MethodEndpoint>



Update or create metadata for lock address.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"network","required":true,"description":"Network id.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"in":"path","name":"lockAddress","required":true,"description":"Lock address.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"JSON metadata inside metadata field will be saved.","type":"object","nullable":false,"properties":{"metadata":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
